summary.title: Hello World!
summary.description: I am Juan, a passionate web developer based in Colombia.

firstView.title: Who I am
firstView.description: I am a full stack web developer with a strong focus on code efficiency and creating elegant UI/UX experiences.

thirdView.title: Experience
thirdView.description: I am a graduate of Henry's bootcamp ( +800 hours) and am eager to apply all my knowledge in a technology company. My background as a historian allows me to read endless papers and books on any subject without difficulty, a skill I use daily to learn, update, and refine my skills as a developer.

muscleLab.title: MuscleLab
muscleLab.description: Muscle Lab is a web page designed to manage a fictional gym. It features embedded payment methods, appointment scheduling, user-friendly interfaces, and an admin dashboard that allows administrators to set and modify various aspects of the gym, including lessons, locations, memberships, trainers, and more.

contactMe.title: Contact me
contactMe.subtitle: Got a project to develop?
contactMe.description: Get your space suit ready and tell me your ideas to develop your dream application.
